Memcmp performance test

The performance and optimzation test for memcmp. Uses the framework provided by "test_" Test framework for performance testing and "loop_" Standard loops for testing and reporting. More...
Status

The testing and optimization has be completed

Current Standings

  • Winner: lxDw lxd_memcmp 26-66% improvement vs. local (i486)
  • Honorable mention: i686 28-58% improvement vs. local (i486)
Candidates

  • local the i486 glibc memcmp
  • i386 the i386 glibc assembly code
  • i686 the i686 glibc assembly code (unrolled movl; movl; cmpl;)
  • lxCond a rep/byte compare (repe;cmpsb)
  • lxDw a rep/dword compare (repe;cmpsl), with remainder cmpsb
Notes

The performance of the unrolled i686, while slightly less than lxDw's repe approach, is suggestive of approaches to take for other optimizations.
